DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate single dose pharmacokinetics ( PK ) subcutaneous ( SC ) darbepoetin alfa subject congestive heart failure ( CHF ) anemia .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Repeat-Dose Subcutaneous Darbepoetin Alfa Subjects With Congestive Heart Failure Anemia , Single Dose Healthy Age- Sex-Matched Control Subjects
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic CHF despite optimized therapy least previous 3 month ( treatment include diuretic , angiotensin convert enzyme [ ACE ] inhibitor , and/or A2 antagonist , unless tolerate ) Hemoglobin great equal 12.5 g/dL time screen
